findings.title: Re-entrancy bug
findings.description: State variable updated after calling an external function.

findings.title: Missing zero address validation
findings.description: No checking for zero address for _treasuryWallet in the constructor. In case of zero address provided there is no ability to change it later, therefore withdrawETH and withdrawStars functions will fail.

findings.title: Benign reentrancy
findings.description: listTokens and startAuction contain a reentrancy. The reentrancy is benign because it's exploitation would have the same effect as two consecutive calls.

findings.title: Events reentrancy
findings.description: buyTokens, endAuction, endAuctionWithoutOracle and listTokens contain a reentrancy. If such reentrancies happen, the corresponding events fired by functions will be shown in an incorrect order, which might lead to issues for third parties.
